episodes.title: The brothers who believed they were angels| Rise and fall of the Mancoba cult
episodes.description:
Dive into the chilling true story of the *Eastern Cape 7 Angels saga* — a tale of manipulation, fear, and a deadly cult that shook South Africa to its core. This video uncovers how a religious sect turned into a dangerous stronghold that defied authorities, controlled a community, and ended in one of the darkest moments in Eastern Cape history. Explore the rise and fall of the 7 Angels Ministry, the tragic police station attack, and the lingering questions about power, belief, and vulnerability. This is more than a story — it's a warning, a lesson, and a call to remain vigilant.
